title: Validate if lb-mode field is missing (not added) in smtpsettings.json with single next hop [Regression scenario], Featuer Flag is ENABLED
custom_steps:
- Enable feature flag
- If there any no change to smtpsettings.json or domains are configured with single nexthop configurations
- This shouldn't cause any parsing or runtime error with email back connections
custom_expected:
- Ensure with backend feature on, shouldn't expect multi nexthops.
- Traffic E2E should work with existing smtpsetting.json value
